attributes.action: Reverse the decision to halt production of inhalers for asthmatics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently the government decided to halt the production of inhalers due to the CFCs they give off. Priorities should be geared towards saving lives. Not being seen as "eco-friendly". Therefore the production of such inhalers should continue until an effective alternative can be found.
